in next 2 sts on round 1 of hem turn pro tip turn your work counterclockwise at photo 30 photo 31 the end of row 2 bringing working yarn in front round 2 ws chain 1 half_double_crochet in st marked with pink of your work for a neater edge along the cuff marker * slip_stitch in next st half_double_crochet in next st around turn your work clockwise at the end of row 3 until you reach last st marked with yellow marker bringing working yarn behind your work for slip_stitch in this st move yellow marker in first st of the best results make sure your turning directions round a half_double_crochet and pink marker in last st of the round a are consistent throughout the project slip_stitch skip the joining slip_stitch from prev round and the tch repeat rnds 2-3 around the entire sweater and join via slip_stitch in top of first half_double_crochet of the round turn fasten_off seam first and last ribbing row together using a tapestry needle and the mattress stitch go to sleeves you ll now work one setup round on each sleeve starting in the center of the underarm chain across photo 32 the short row edges and across the sleeve panel on repeat round 2 38 38 38 36 36 34
